# licenses add

Add license to Coder deployment

## Usage

```console
coder licenses add [flags] [-f file | -l license]
```

## Options

### --debug

|      |                   |
| ---- | ----------------- |
| Type | <code>bool</code> |

Output license claims for debugging.

### -f, --file

|      |                     |
| ---- | ------------------- |
| Type | <code>string</code> |

Load license from file.

### -l, --license

|      |                     |
| ---- | ------------------- |
| Type | <code>string</code> |

License string.
